thread.title: US 'to announce ban on passengers from a dozen countries carrying most electronice devices on US-bound flights'
thread.title_full: US 'to announce ban on passengers from a dozen countries carrying most electronice devices on US-bound flights'

title: US 'to announce ban on passengers from a dozen countries carrying most electronice devices on US-bound flights'
text:
US 'to announce ban on passengers from a dozen countries carrying most electronice devices on US-bound flights' 20 March 2017 â€¢ 9:43pm 
U .S. authorities are planning to ban passengers traveling on certain U.S.-bound foreign airline flights from carrying on larger electronic devices in response to an unspecified terrorism threat, a U.S. government official told Reuters. 
The official said no American carriers are impacted by the ban, which would involve devices larger than a cell phone. The new rule is expected to be announced on Tuesday by the Homeland Security Department and cover about a dozen foreign carriers. 
More to follow.
